title: (x) About Face by David Jury book cover - Univers {Lex}
content:
Hi,

Is anyone here familiar with the book ABOUT FACE by David Jury? See below

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203183750im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/2880466776_4481.01.LZZZZZZZ.jpg)

I really wanted to find out exactly the main typefaces used throughout this book.  
And also the vendor I could purchase these typefaces from.

Also I am after an entire family of Helvitica in its purist form, as in closest digital version  
to the original and best family. I have “bit and pieces” of helvetica laying around but nothing  
in its entirety (family etc).

I hope I made sense here. Any help would be much appreciated.
